title: Microsoft India | L62 SDE 2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 3 BTech
Years of Experience: ~ 4 Years
Offer Date: July 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L62
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 36L
Signing Bonus: 3 (2 + 1)
Relocation Bonus : NA
Stock bonus: 48k USD for 4 years
Bonus: (0-20%) of base pay

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): First Year - 36(Base) + 2(JB) + 10(Stocks) = 48 + 0~7.2(Bonus) = 48~55.2
Benefits: Standard microsoft benefits
Other details:
Prev Comp - 26 LPA + Bonus (0-30%)

HR is not ready to negotiate, he said stocks are quite bit team dependent, current CTC and interview feedback dependent also besides position. 

I did read multiple L62 comp here and seems quite a bit low ball, but as I have no competing offer, have accepted it. Moreover I had enough struggle pushing for L62 itself as previous HM was giving me L61 and already  had rejected it even before offer consideration.

title: Microsoft L60 | Oracle OCI MTS | Confused
content:
Education: Tier 1 BTech+MTech
Years of Experience: 2

Company: Oracle OCI
Title/Level: MTS
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 27.4 LPA
Signing Bonus: 6L (3 + 3)
Relocation Bonus : NA
Stock bonus: 35k USD for 4 years
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 27.4 + 3 + 7.2 = 37.6 LPA

Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L60
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 25 LPA
Signing Bonus: 5L (3 + 2)
Relocation Bonus : 4 Lakhs (3 lakhs post tax)
Stock bonus: 48k USD for 4 years
Bonus: (0-20%) of base pay
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 
First Year - 25 + 3 + 4 + 10 + (2.5-5) = 44-46 Lakhs
Second Year - 25 + 2 + 10 + (2.5-5) = 39-41 Lakhs

Other Details : 
Microsoft offer was released after showing competing offer from OCI. I'm confused which company to join.

1) Should I renegotitate with OCI for higher comp/SMTS role? Current Location is Bangalore and Microsoft is for Hyderabad Location.
2) I have accepted microsoft offer but I still feel they have lowballed me on the stocks part. How can I renegotiate after accepting the offer?
3) Which org gives more hikes each year?
4) What's the average time to get promoted from L60 to L61 at MS? Also how much time it will take for a promotion to SMTS if I join at MTS role at OCI?
5) Work in OCI is exciting as compared to Microsoft

title: URGENT - Offer Discussion
content:
**Education**: BTech CSE 2024 Grad (NIT/IIIT)
**Years of Experience**: 0
**Prior Experience**: Open source + SDE Intern (3 months) mostly in Java

**Offer 1 [PPO]**
**Company**: Early Startup (Started around half a year back)
**Title/Level**: SDE 1 (Onsite)
**Salary**: 7 LPA (Fixed) 
**Total comp**: 7 LPA
**Other details**: I did my SDE intern here. Work revolves around Java which matches with my previous experience. Very hectic working schedule. May have to work 9-10+ hours on critical deadlines! Senior engineers have previous experience in Top MNCs. Team size is very small (<15 members) so it is somewhat like high risk high reward later on.

**Offer 2** 
**Company**: Mid-Sized Startup (150-300 members)
**Title/Level**: SDE Intern (6 months - Onsite) [with option of PPO that totally depends on performance] 
**Salary**: 35K/month
**Other details**: Heard that they offer (12 LPA+) if converted. But they work on MERN in which I have no experience. WLB is chill. Team is good here as well. 

Please help me decide which is the best offer to choose considering the learning curve, money factor and a good chance of switching to MNC after 1-1.5 years.
Also, not sure how good is to do intern after graduation. 

I would love to hear from you guys!
company: Early Startup (started Around Half A Year Back)
cleanCompany: Early Startup Started Around Half A Year Back

title: Deloitte | Consultant | Jul 2024 | India
content:
Hi Everyone,

I recently received an offer from Deloitte for a Consultant position and would appreciate your feedback on the salary package. Here are the details:

Education: B.Tech
Years of Experience: 3+
Prior Experience: MNC
Date of the Offer: Jul, 2024
Company: Deloitte
Title/Level: Consultant
Location:  India
Base Salary: ₹ 15,00,000
Relocation: ₹ 50,000
Signing Bonus: ₹ 1,00,000
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: Performance-based bonus 0-10% of salary every year
Benefits: Communication Expenses - ₹ 3000/month
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ~ ₹ 16,50,000
Previous company - WITCH
Previous CTC ~ ₹ 8,20,000


Thanks in advance for your help.

title: Microsoft India | L61 SDE2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: Btech in Computer Science(Tier 2 college)
Years of Experience: 2 years
Date of Offer:  June 2024
Company: Microsoft India
Title: SDE 2
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: INR 26,00,000
Relocation: None
Joining Bonus: None
Stock Bonus: USD 60,000 (vested over 4 years)
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
Total Compensation: ~INR 40LPA
Other Benifits: Standard MS benefits
Other details: Its a final offer, recruiter not open for negotiation.

Current Compensation:
Base : INR 20,00,000
Annual Bonus: INR 3,00,000
Stocks : INR 6,50,000 (vested over 4 years)
Total Compensation : ~25 LPA

Looks like MSFT has given a lowball offer compared to other offer I see on Leetcode/Blind for L61. Compared to my current compensation its a pretty good hike but compared to what other are getting I see it as a lowball offer.

Please provide suggestions if any.
Thanks
